SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.ui.tui

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.ui.tui.CLI
public class CLI extends Object
The CLI class provides a command-line interface (CLI) for interacting with the simplified game model. It includes methods for displaying game information to the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CLI(SimplifiedModel miniModel)
    Constructs a new CLI instance with the specified simplified game model.
